name: Creamy Spinach Soup. Vegan, Gluten Free.
description: Creamy spinach soup. A delicious warming and super quick spinach soup. Vegan and Gluten Free.

itemListElement.text: about 3-4 packed cups of fresh spinach, washed and chopped.
itemListElement.name: about 3-4 packed cups of fresh spinach, washed and chopped.

itemListElement.text: 1/2 green chili or chili flakes to taste
itemListElement.name: 1/2 green chili or chili flakes to taste

itemListElement.text: 1/4 cup ground raw cashew (or blend the cashews before hand with a little water to make a cream and add that)
itemListElement.name: 1/4 cup ground raw cashew (or blend the cashews before hand with a little water to make a cream and add that)

itemListElement.text: Blend all with 1/2+ cup water till nicely pureed.
itemListElement.name: Blend all with 1/2+ cup water till nicely pureed.

itemListElement.text: In a pan, add a teaspoon of organic canola oil or coconut oil on medium heat. Add 1/2 teaspoon of Kashmiri Garam masala and mix well for half a minute till you can smell the aroma of the spices.
itemListElement.name: In a pan, add a teaspoon of organic canola oil or coconut oil on medium heat. Add 1/2 teaspoon of Kashmiri Garam masala and mix well for half a minute till you can smell the aroma of the spices.

itemListElement.text: Add spinach puree and cook on medium heat till it comes to a boil 5-7 minutes. Mix, taste, adjust salt/spices and take off heat after a minute.
itemListElement.name: Add spinach puree and cook on medium heat till it comes to a boil 5-7 minutes. Mix, taste, adjust salt/spices and take off heat after a minute.

itemListElement.text: Serve hot topped with paprika, with crackers or garlic rolls.
itemListElement.name: Serve hot topped with paprika, with crackers or garlic rolls.

itemListElement.text: Oil-free Raw- Blend everything including the garam masala into a soup consistency. Top with nuts, paprika. Serve with raw crackers, celery, other veggies or as is.
